titleInfo.title: A recursive bound for the number of complete K-subgraphs of a graph
Topics in combinatorics and graph theory: essays in honour of Gerhard Ringel

bibliographicCitation.mla: Ahlswede, Rudolf, Cai, Ning, and Zhang, Zhen. “A recursive bound for the number of complete K-subgraphs of a graph”. Topics in combinatorics and graph theory: essays in honour of Gerhard Ringel. Ed. Rainer Bodendiek and Rudolf Henn. Heidelberg: Physica-Verl., 1990. 37-39.
